personal_statement_what_to_improve: Your application did not provide enough specific detail to indicate that you have looked at the UK Computing curriculum, to show that you are qualified to deliver the content. We would also normally expect a salaried trainee to have had recent experience in a secondary education environment to cope with the demands of this programme.
